Interactions¶

CommonInteraction¶

class CommonInteraction(*_, **__)¶

Bases: interactions.base.interaction.Interaction, sims4communitylib.logging.has_log.HasLog

Enables hooks into the functionality of an Interaction

apply_posture_state(posture_state: postures.posture_state.PostureState, participant_type: interactions.ParticipantType = interactions.ParticipantType.Actor, sim: sims.sim.Sim = singletons.DEFAULT)¶

Apply a posture to a sim.

Parameters

  • posture_state – The posture state to apply.

  • participant_type – The ParticipantType of the actor.

  • sim – The sim to apply posture states to.

Returns

Unknown

cancel(finishing_type: interactions.interaction_finisher.FinishingType, cancel_reason_msg: str, **kwargs) → bool¶

Cancel the interaction.

Parameters

  • finishing_type – The type of cancellation occurring.

  • cancel_reason_msg – The reason it was cancelled.

Returns

True if cancellation is successful, False if cancellation failed.

static create_test_result(result: bool, reason: str = None, text_tokens: Union[Tuple[Any], List[Any], Set[Any]] = (), tooltip: Union[int, str, sims4communitylib.utils.localization.common_localization_utils.CommonLocalizationUtils.LocalizedTooltip] = None, icon=None, influence_by_active_mood: bool = False) → event_testing.results.TestResult¶

Create a TestResult with the specified information.

Parameters

  • result – The result of a test. True for passed, False for failed.

  • reason – The reason for the Test Result (This is displayed as a tooltip to the player when the interaction is disabled).

  • text_tokens – Any text tokens to include format into the reason.

  • tooltip – The tooltip displayed when hovering the interaction while it is disabled.

  • icon – The icon of the outcome.

  • influence_by_active_mood – If true, the Test Result will be influenced by the active mood.

Returns

An object of type TestResult.

kill() → bool¶

Kill the interaction. (Hard Cancel)

property mod_identity¶

The Identity of the mod that owns this class.

modify_posture_state(posture_state: postures.posture_state.PostureState, participant_type: interactions.ParticipantType = interactions.ParticipantType.Actor, sim: sims.sim.Sim = singletons.DEFAULT) → Tuple[postures.posture_state.PostureState, interactions.ParticipantType, Any]¶

Modify the posture state, participant type or sim of the interaction.

Parameters

  • posture_state – The posture state to modify.

  • participant_type – The ParticipantType of the actor to modify.

  • sim – The sim to apply posture states to.

Returns

Return a modified PostureState, ParticipantType, and Sim.

on_cancelled(interaction_sim: sims.sim.Sim, interaction_target: Any, finishing_type: interactions.interaction_finisher.FinishingType, cancel_reason_msg: str, **kwargs) → None¶

Occurs upon the interaction being cancelled.

Parameters

  • interaction_sim – The sim performing the interaction.

  • interaction_target – The target of the interaction.

  • finishing_type – The type of cancellation.

  • cancel_reason_msg – The reason for the cancellation.

on_killed(interaction_sim: sims.sim.Sim, interaction_target: Any) → bool¶

Occurs upon the interaction being killed.

Parameters

  • interaction_sim – The sim performing the interaction.

  • interaction_target – The target of the interaction.

Returns

True if the interaction hook was executed successfully.

on_performed(interaction_sim: sims.sim.Sim, interaction_target: Any) → None¶

Occurs after the interaction has been performed.

Parameters

  • interaction_sim – The source Sim of the interaction.

  • interaction_target – The target Sim of the interaction.

on_reset() → None¶

Occurs upon the interaction being reset.

on_started(interaction_sim: sims.sim.Sim, interaction_target: Any) → bool¶

Occurs upon the interaction being started.

Parameters

  • interaction_sim – The sim performing the interaction.

  • interaction_target – The target of the interaction.

Returns

True if the interaction hook was executed successfully.

classmethod on_test(interaction_sim: sims.sim.Sim, interaction_target: Any, interaction_context: interactions.context.InteractionContext, **kwargs) → event_testing.results.TestResult¶

A hook that occurs upon the interaction being tested for run.

Parameters

  • interaction_sim – The sim performing the interaction.

  • interaction_target – The target of the interaction.

  • interaction_context – The context of the interaction.

:return The result of successfully running the test.

on_run(interaction_sim: sims.sim.Sim, interaction_target: Any, timeline) → bool¶

Occurs upon the interaction being run.

Parameters

  • interaction_sim – The sim performing the interaction.

  • interaction_target – The target of the interaction.

  • timeline – The timeline the interaction is running on.

Returns

True if the interaction hook was executed successfully.
